pctOfWindowRequiredToBeStationary

public float pctOfWindowRequiredToBeStationary()
Description copied from class: LocationSet
Returns the percentage of the window that must be considered stationary for a new location to be created.

Specified by:
pctOfWindowRequiredToBeStationary in class LocationSet

retrieveNumMerged

public long retrieveNumMerged(long location_id)
Returns the number of locations that have been merged into this location. This should be used for computing the number of "neighbours" of a location, because if this is >1, then it means that this location actually represents more than one location, and should count as more than one neighbour.

Parameters:
location_id - The id of the location being queried.
Returns:
The number of locations that have been merged into the specified location.

usesTimeBasedWindow

public boolean usesTimeBasedWindow()
Description copied from class: LocationSet
Returns true if the algorithm is using a fixed time length for the window, or false if the window contains a fixed number of samples.

Specified by:
usesTimeBasedWindow in class LocationSet
